message: Hi Bob, let's start off on a good foot. I think 60/40 is a fair split in my favor since I'm making the first move.
Hey Alice, I think 55/45 is a more balanced split.  Let's get this game started!
Bob, let's be reasonable.  I came down a bit, you need to come up. This is a fair deal considering the time pressure.
Alice, let's be fair.  50/50 is the most reasonable split at this point. We can't keep going back and forth, we're losing money! Let's just end this game.
